tool_description: Summarize any text using state of the art artificial intelligence technology in a human-like manner.
name: TLDR
title: TLDR

api_list.name: summary
api_list.description:
The API endpoint is /summary and it only accepts POST requests.

Properties:
text (required): The text to be summarized. The length of the text should not exceed 2500 characters.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: This is some example text to summarize.
